Name: Shadow 小ave
About the game: Shadow cave - Uncover the secrets of the shadow cave in this platformer game with its protagonist. Explore the dark parts of dangerous nooks and crannies, collect coins and avoid thorns. Find your way in a gloomy cave, where pitch darkness reigns, hiding in itself dangers. Rumor has it that ghosts are found in these places .. Whether it is or not, you have to find out, fighting for your own life. Peculiarities: - Nice graphics by ReactorMS - Nice soundtrack By Garganzola07
